name: Game A Week - Week 1
description:
In this game you play as the last human survivor armed with only a trusty sidearm, there is only one goal; Kill or be Killed! As you fight to survive more zombies will begin to spawn on a wave based system, How long can you survive?

Controls:
  • W:- Move Up
  • A:- Move Left
  • S-: Move Down
  • D:- Move Right
  • R:- Reload
  • Left Click:- Shoot
  • Left Shift:- Sprint
Assets Used:
  • Top down survivor by Rileygombart on opengameart.
  • Top down zombie by Rileygombart on opengameart.
  • Road tile mapping by hc on opengameart.
